queries.label: Count the number of entries in the lab table
List unique diagnoses
queries.query: SELECT DISTINCT diagnosisstring FROM diagnosis LIMIT 20;

queries.label: Get average age of patients grouped by gender
queries.query: SELECT gender, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM patient GROUP BY gender;

queries.label: Get number of diagnoses per patient
queries.query: SELECT patientunitstayid, COUNT(*) AS diagnosis_count FROM diagnosis GROUP BY patientunitstayid ORDER BY diagnosis_count DESC;

queries.label: Join patient and vitalperiodic to get heart rate info
queries.query: SELECT p.patientunitstayid, p.gender, v.heartrate FROM patient p JOIN vitalperiodic v ON p.patientunitstayid = v.patientunitstayid WHERE v.heartrate IS NOT NULL LIMIT 50;

queries.label: Get minimum and maximum temperature from vitalperiodic
Compute average heart rate for patients with >100 vitals entries
queries.query: SELECT patientunitstayid, AVG(heartrate) AS avg_hr FROM vitalperiodic GROUP BY patientunitstayid HAVING COUNT(*) > 100 ORDER BY avg_hr DESC LIMIT 20;
